name: Monday Salad
recipeIngredient: 1 head iceberg or other firm, crunchy lettuce, chopped medium fine
1 European cucumber, peeled, seeded and diced
1/2 sweet onion, peeled and chopped medium fine
1 tablespoon niçoise olives, pitted and chopped medium fine
1 tablespoon sherry vinegar or red-wine vinegar

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, mix the first 8 ingredients. Mix in the oil, then the vinegar, then salt to taste, although the anchovies may be salty enough.
